Parameters: PresetReverb: the PresetReverb on which the interface is registered.
int: status of the set parameter operation.
int: ID of the modified parameter. See @B_android#media#audiofx#PresetReverb#PARAM_PRESET_E@ ...
onParameterChange(android.media.audiofx..Description: Method called when a parameter value has changed. The method is called only if the parameter was changed by another application having the control of the same PresetReverb engine.
onParameterChange(android.media.audiofx..FullName: public abstract void onParameterChange (PresetReverb effect, int status, int param, short value)

ClassDesc: The OnParameterChangeListener interface defines a method called by the PresetReverb when a parameter value has changed.
